profile:
Serving customers in the GTA for over 50 year! 

With our extensive knowledge of cleaning and repair techniques, commitment to service and competitive pricing, we know that each of our customers will be proud to have us take care of their drapery, blind, carpet and upholstery cleaning. 

We provide a variety of service options including our popular and convenient in home full-service take down and rehanging, as well as in-store over the counter options. 

See the difference that clean draperies can make!
